info.title: AIPlayground API
info.description: Playground for AI models and tools, chatbots and other AI-powered systems.

get.description:
OpenApi3 schema for this API. Format can be selected via content negotiation.

- YAML: application/vnd.oai.openapi
- JSON: application/vnd.oai.openapi+json
Concrete view for retrieving, updating or deleting a context instance.

put.description: Concrete view for retrieving, updating or deleting a context instance.

patch.description: Concrete view for retrieving, updating or deleting a context instance.

delete.description: Concrete view for retrieving, updating or deleting a context instance.

FinishReasonEnum.description:
* `stop` - Stop
* `length` - Length
* `tool_calls` - Tool calls
* `content_filter` - Content filter
* `function_call` - Function call
